content: **description from knitty com ** the bag has a square base and is knitted in the round the handles are grafted together using the kitchener stitch liadomingues 1 has translated this pattern with polly authorization into portuguese including adaptation for brazilian yarns http //artesbruxas blogspot com/2007/05/french-market 2 danish version 3 french version 4 1 http //www ravelry com/people/liadomingues 2 http //artesbruxas blogspot com/2007/05/french-market-bag-de-polly-outhwaite html 3 https //web archive org/web/20101203193050/http //www alltangledup com/movabletype/my_images/my_patterns/fmb_dansk pdf 4 https //web archive org/web/20101203115036/http //www alltangledup com/movabletype/my_images/my_patterns/fmb_francais pdf
